story.text: NEW YORK Jan 3 Health insurer WellPoint Inc. WLP.N said on Wednesday it plans to confirm its prior earnings forecasts at meetings later this month with analysts and investors. The company said last month it expects to earn $5.53 per share in 2007, and forecast operating revenue growing 10 percent to $61.9 billion next year.
story.title: wellpoint to confirm forecasts in analyst meetings
